body.transcript:
Hello, welcome to Harmony Music School's customer support. My name is Joseph Parker. How can I assist you today?

Hi, my name is Elizabeth Thompson. I'm feeling a bit nervous about the status of my shipment.

No need to worry, Elizabeth. I'm here to help you. Could you please provide me with your order number?

Yes, of course. Let me get it for you. It's A-B-C one two three four.

Thank you, Elizabeth. Could you also confirm the shipping address you used for this order?

Sure, it's one two three Main Street, Apt four five six, Springfield.

Great, let me check the status for you. Please hold on for a moment.

Thank you for waiting, Elizabeth. Your shipment is on track and is expected to arrive by this Friday.

That's a relief to hear. Thank you so much, Joseph!

You're welcome, Elizabeth. Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!

You're welcome, Elizabeth. Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
